title: GRIFFEL_bim_data Serializable Object
description: Contains same properties as embedded version plus properties to node map. Used only when data is saved in a separate file.

nodeProperties.description: Node type and instance properties map. Used only when data is saved in a separate file.

node.description: Index of the node index in glTF file

item.description: Index of a property from the root level collection.

properties.description: Collection of indices which point to corresponding instance properties of the node. (Instance properties are unique to the node. They override the same type properties.)

type.description: Index of a type in the root level collection. (Type is a set of properties which are common for many nodes.)
